channel.title: Update the private servers?
channel.description:
Sorry to be posting so many topics but seeing as Jagex released 100+ new t-trail items and new areas, why doesn't anyone try to update private servers so we can have construction and new t-trail items on private servers?
I tried ::pickup'ing a Dragon 2 Hander (code 7518 I think) and I kept getting an error message. For some reason pickup doesn't work with items with codes past 5000.
I'd like to see construction on private servers with lowered prices, etc.
Why hasn't no-one tried this yet?

item.title: Update the private servers?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

You do not want to mess with me. I would engage you in a battle of wits, but it is my policy (For the moment, it may change) not to attack one who is unarmed. Come back when you know Java.

Read full topic

item.title: Update the private servers?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[quote=“ImmortalKaine, post:1, topic:42100”]Sorry to be posting so many topics but seeing as Jagex released 100+ new t-trail items and new areas, why doesn’t anyone try to update private servers so we can have construction and new t-trail items on private servers?

I tried ::pickup’ing a Dragon 2 Hander (code 7518 I think) and I kept getting an error message. For some reason pickup doesn’t work with items with codes past 5000.

I’d like to see construction on private servers with lowered prices, etc.

Why hasn’t no-one tried this yet?[/quote]

The servers can support unlimited items. The clients cannot. You think that people haven’t been trying? Go try yourself before you make claims on matters you know nothing about.

http://ul7.runescape.com/runescape.jar

Read full topic
